bill_title: Recognizing and commending Jeremiah Assman, Tyler Beauchamp, Scott Eddie, Brady Faubion, Chris Faubion, Gary Fisher, Ike Laber, Luke Laber, Jason Lanning, John Little, Mike Neyens, Sam Voegeli, Matt Weidner, A. J. Wiley, and Logan Wiley of Boy Scout Troop 100 in Winner, South Dakota, for earning the rank of Eagle Scout.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Recognizing and commending Jeremiah Assman, Tyler Beauchamp, Scott Eddie, Brady Faubion, Chris Faubion, Gary Fisher, Ike Laber, Luke Laber, Jason Lanning, John Little, Mike Neyens, Sam Voegeli, Matt Weidner, A. J. Wiley, and Logan Wiley of Boy Scout Troop 100 in Winner, South Dakota, for earning the rank of Eagle Scout. WHEREAS, Jeremiah Assman, Tyler Beauchamp, Scott Eddie, Brady Faubion, Chris Faubion, Gary Fisher, Ike Laber, Luke Laber, Jason Lanning, John Little, Mike Neyens, Sam Voegeli, Matt Weidner, A. J. Wiley, and Logan Wiley have completed the requirements, been examined by an Eagle Scout Board of Review, and found worthy of the rank of Eagle Scout; and WHEREAS, the above listed young men of Troop 100 in Winner, South Dakota, have been involved in Boy Scouts for many years and have all received a ranking that less than four percent of the Scouts receive; and WHEREAS, Troop 100 was chartered in 1921, and this is by far the largest number of Eagle Scouts ever turned out in a single troop; and the future of South Dakota depends on the dedication and leadership of young people such as these young men: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature commends Jeremiah Assman, Tyler Beauchamp, Scott Eddie, Brady Faubion, Chris Faubion, Gary Fisher, Ike Laber, Luke Laber, Jason Lanning, John Little, Mike Neyens, Sam Voegeli, Matt Weidner, A. J. Wiley, and Logan Wiley for achieving the rank of Eagle Scout.
